abstract: Bernhard Langer is in eight-way tie for lead after Senior British Open golf tournament's opening round; Barry Lane and Steve Jones each hit an albatross, score of 2 on par 5, first in senior tour history; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Two albatross twos were recorded on the same hole on a memorable opening day at the Senior British Open.

headline.main: Two Albatrosses at Senior British Open

snippet: Two albatross twos were recorded on the same hole on a memorable opening day at the Senior British Open.
